name: Byond Line
description:
Team Name:
Team Lafian

Gameplay Instructions:
Local Multiplayer
First player: Keyboard & mouse
A & D : Moving
LMB : Shooting
Esc : Menu
Second player: Gamepad
Left stick : Moving
RIght Stick : Aim
Roght Sholder : Shooting

What platform is your game built for?

Windows

List any content that was created before the jam.
Pawn animation - Template Third Person Character Unreal Engine 5

Notes:

Background arts generated Midjourney AI
Voice generated Replika AI
Sound and Music Record with Studio One 5 Professional
